Create an AI-powered chatbot that helps people find information and provides personalized recommendations based on their preferences and past interactions.
Develop an AI-based virtual assistant that helps people manage their daily tasks and schedules, such as setting reminders, scheduling appointments, and sending emails.
Create an AI-powered recommendation engine that suggests products or services to customers based on their browsing and purchase history.
Develop an AI-based image recognition system that can identify and classify objects in images, which can be used in a variety of applications such as security, healthcare, and retail.
Create an AI-powered language translation tool that can accurately translate spoken or written language in real-time, making communication easier for people who speak different languages.
